channel.title: Portfolios on 22nd MC Recruitment Drive
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on 22nd MC Recruitment Drive

item.title: Community Service
item.description: Benedict (Director) Vevek (Deputy) About The Community Service Cell aims to be the avenue for School of Computing students to serve others so as to positively impact the community. Join us as we embark on this journey to grow and bring joy to the community around us! Goals To provide an avenue to NUS Computing students to support external welfare organisations in need To help inspire change in others To instill a community-oriented spirit Responsibilities Flag Project Committee This committee will focus on raising funds for and engaging our beneficiary, Fernvale Gardens School.

item.title: Academic Liaison
item.description: Jia Hui (Director) Kymie (Deputy) Overview The Academic Liaison cell aims to promote the academic interests and facilitate the academic pursuits of the student body in the School of Computing (SoC). The cell seeks to bridge the student population and the school with regards to academic matters. The Academic Liaison cell plans activities such as mock Practical Examinations, Academic Day and hackathons to ensure that students of SoC have enough resources to excel.
